question: February 11 is observed as ___________.
option1: International Day of Women and Girls in Science
option2: International Day for the Elimination of Racial Discrimination
option3: International Day of Sport for Development and Peace
answer: International Day of Women and Girls in Science
explanation: On 11th February 2018, International Day of Women and Girls in Science was celebrated all over the world. United Nations General Assembly declared 11th February as the International Day of Women and Girls in Science in order to gain access and participation for women and girls in science. This day also aims to work towards gender equality and empowerment of women and girls. On this day, celebrations are organized by UNESCO and UN-Women, jointly with institutions and organisations that promote women and girls' participation in science.
